name: Takis Isofidou
story: Takis grew up in a small village in Southern Greece. His father was a fisherman and his mother was a seamstress. Takis was always fascinated by military operations and machinery, leading him to join the Greek Army after completing high school. He excelled in his training and was posted in Afghanistan. After a successful tour, he returned to Greece and joined the local defense forces before being recruited by the Independent faction in Arma 3.
